mapper.select: SELECT p.*, u.nickname, u.username, u.avatar_url as avatarUrl FROM post p LEFT JOIN user u ON p.user_id = u.user_id WHERE p.post_id = #{postId}
SELECT p.*, u.nickname, u.username, u.avatar_url as avatarUrl FROM post p LEFT JOIN user u ON p.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY p.created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT p.*, u.nickname, u.username, u.avatar_url as avatarUrl FROM post p INNER JOIN post_tag pt ON p.post_id = pt.post_id LEFT JOIN user u ON p.user_id = u.user_id WHERE pt.tag_id = #{tagId} ORDER BY p.created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (user_id, content, topic, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{content}, #{topic}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post WHERE user_id = #{userId}
